titles.title: Women and Lung Cancer Research and Preventive Services Act of 2025
Women and Lung Cancer Research and Preventive Services Act of 2025
A bill to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a review to evaluate the status of research on lung cancer in women and underserved populations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
